articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: CELTIC legend Scott Brown has emerged as a shock favourite for the manager’s job at Cheltenham Town. Brown, who is 1/4 favourite with the bookies according to Gloucestershire Live, [...]

articles.description: One of the many mysteries of football is why Anthony Ralston (now 24) was so far out the picture in the latter stages of Neil Lennon’s tenure.  Kris Ajer, Moritz Bauer, Jeremie Frimpong and Jonjoe Kenny were all selected at right back ahead of him.  When he was brought back into the fold by Ange [...]
articles.title: Ralston, rarity and mystery

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: IT took Joe Hart a lifetime in football and 737 games before he saw red. The 36-year-old 75 times-capped England keeper was ordered off for the first time in his illustrious career in Celtic’s 3-0 win over Livingston in West Lothian on Saturday. And Hart was red-carded for the second time in three days as [...]
articles.title: JOE HART SEES RED – AGAIN

articles.description: JAMES McCARTHY is so far out of the picture at Celtic he was not included in the club’s team photo yesterday. McCarthy still has two years of his deal to [...]

Discussions between Hatate, who joined from Kawasaki Frontale in January 2022, and the [...]

Livingston on Saturday was only Alistair’s third full 90 [...]
